message:
Most people use social media like Facebook and Twitter to share photos of friends and family, chat with friends and strangers about random and amusing diversions, or follow their favorite websites, bands and television shows.

‎"'Personas' were to have detailed, fictionalized backgrounds, to make them believable... & a sophisticated identity protection service... preventing suspicious readers from uncovering the real person behind the account. They even worked out ways to game geolocating services, so these 'personas' could... [provide] ostensibly live commentary on real events, even while the operator was not really present."
